features.featureTitle: Replace the first of the 4 footer images in the document preview and PDF rendering with the uploaded image '20260228_092922_0002.png' (showing 'Yours faithfully, Dhani Finance LTD.' with signature and 'P Harish Reddy, Chief Executive Officer'). Save this image as a static asset at 'frontend/public/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png' and update both PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts to use this new image as the first footer image instead of the previous one.
